modName: Friendly Guards - Guards will help you
summary: With this mod guards of every city will help you fighting against your enemies too (not only against theirs)
descriptionHtml:
With this mod guards of every city will help you fighting against your enemies too (not only against theirs).  It adds the \\\\\\\"player fation\\\\\\\" to the guard fiend faction.

For any bug or suggestion write me to this address: alessandro.vanzo.bat@gmail.com.

Enjoy.
author: Getaway1
